name: gulp-controlled-merge-json
description: A gulp plugin to merge JSON files into one file with additional conflict resolution functionality
author: Robin Janssens <robin.janssens@gmail.com>

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
